library(tidyverse)

```{r}
# sysrev to celldesigner project compartment species and reaction tables
token <- rstudioapi::askForSecret("sysrev token w/ ontox access")
pid <- 117883
aid <- 14352862
# get table Sysrev tables based on pid and aid
get_rsr <- function(pid, aid){
  rsr::get_answers_list(pid, token=token) %>% lapply(function(x){x[which(x["aid"] == aid),]})
}
rsr_tables <- get_rsr(pid, aid)
```
